items.name: Honeywell

overview.description: Built an application to Streamline facility operations with Honeywell Site Manager. Gaining real-time visibility and control over HVAC, lighting, and energy systems across multiple zones and locations—all from a single intuitive dashboard - supporting mobile device, drove ARR through major platform integrations. Focused on developer experience, platform scalability, and strategic partnerships.

achievements.title: Site Manager for Honeywell Building Management Systems

achievements.description: ...an application to Streamline facility operations with Honeywell Site Manager. Gaining real-time visibility and control over HVAC, lighting, and energy systems across multiple zones and locations—all from a single intuitive dashboard - supporting mobile device,.
impact: Increased user engagement with HVAC,light equipment observability and timely alerts
Easy to use for a non-tech user
Reduced integration,support and turn around time
Mobile-Optimized Smart Building Management for QSR, Retail & Multisite Operators
Built automated to support HVAC,light and other asset types

achievements.title: Self-Service Onboarding Portal
achievements.description: Designed for real-time visibility,control and optimization of building systems across multiple facilities
impact: Optimized Onborading duration
Achieved value realization in under a month, down from three.
Seamless user onboarding with required RBAC for authorised control access

achievements.title: Unified Digitization Platform
achievements.description: Led digitization of data across install base for user visuals via KPI dashboard
impact: Migrated data from install base to cloud via connectors

items.name: DELL EMC RSA Security

overview.description: Product strategy for Oracle CX Sales data operations platform — enterprise B2B CRM at scale. Focused on API-driven data management, ML-powered automation, and operational efficiency.

achievements.title: Alternate Key & External System Linking
achievements.description: Led initiative to enable external system ID linking for enterprise data imports — eliminating dependency on Oracle primary keys
impact: Enabled PUID and Original System Reference linking — prevented churn for enterprise customers
Reduced integration complexity for 1:M relationships and Dynamic Choice Lists
Improved data import success rates for enterprise customers with complex system landscapes

achievements.title: ML-Powered Import Prediction
achievements.description: Shipped ML-based prediction system for import job scheduling and resource allocation
impact: Built predictive model for import job completion times
Enabled proactive resource allocation reducing queue wait times
Reduced cost per import cycle through ML-optimized scheduling

achievements.title: Import/Export Ops Optimization
achievements.description: Delivered operational efficiency improvements across the data import/export framework
impact: Implemented dynamic queue management — reduced support escalations
Added reusable advanced options — decreased import/export setup time
Delivered measurable annual savings through operational efficiency
